Control Name: 3.3.5 Autoscaling has been tested under sustained load.
Control Statement: The scaling on any single component may have an impact on downstream application components and dependencies. Autoscaling should therefore be tested regularly to help inform and validate a capacity model describing when and how application components should scale.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 3.3 How are you ensuring that your workload is elastic and responsive to changes?
